//encryption.ts
import CryptoJS from'crypto-js';const secretKey='a0c2b1ab664e5ea5ca735d57f4cdaaf8';export const encrypt=text=>{return CryptoJS.AES.encrypt(text,secretKey).toString();};export const decrypt=ciphertext=>{const bytes=CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(ciphertext,secretKey);return bytes.toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8);};
